description: From French fertiliser; equivalent to fertile +â€Ž -ize.

verbs.description: fertilize (third-person singular simple present fertilizes, present participle fertilizing, simple past and past participle fertilized)

entries.meaning: To make (the soil) more fertile by adding nutrients to it.
(figuratively) To make more creative or intellectually productive.
To cause to produce offspring through insemination; to inseminate.
